title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1810.1 - Authorization
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1810.1 - Authorization

State Regulations

Municipalities may make moving expense payments to
displacees, in connection with an urban renewal project, upon adoption by the
governing body of the municipality of a resolution authorizing and directing
such payments and appropriating the necessary funds therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1810.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
